Text: Monkey Business (TV series):  The series featured Jim Cronin and Alison Cronin, directors of Monkey World, as they travelled around the world rescuing primates often from abusive situations, and bringing them to the Monkey World sanctuary.

Triplets:<Jim Cronin
2:
--------------------
<Text: Monkey Business (TV series):  The goal of Monkey World was the rehabilitation of the rescued primates, who were then released to live within the sanctuary in as natural-a-habitat as possible.>
Triplets:<Monkey Business
